skills: Development of custom Drupal modules and themes
Integration and consumption of REST APIs

technologies.title: Languages and Web
technologies.items: PHP, JavaScript (React, ES6+), CSS3, HTML5, XML, Twig, API REST, jQuery, Ajax

technologies.title: Tools & DevOps

missions: Goal: Design and develop a B2B e-commerce platform under Drupal 10 for La Poste and SNCF.
Creation of a multi-client architecture with advanced access management, dynamic content customization and price adaptation according to the user's role.
Customization of the checkout panel and implementation of specific commercial workflows for orders (optimization of the order process).
Design of custom user interfaces that adapt to customer needs.
Creation of automated Excel exports also accessible to administrators accounts (improvement of monitoring and reporting).
Elasticsearch integration.

Goal: Full development of a submission and voting platform for the New European Bauhaus Prizes competition. Creation of project submission, expert evaluation, secure public voting and real-time result monitoring systems.
Development of the backend/frontend.
Implementation of expert evaluation workflows.
Creation of heavy PDFs using RabbitMQ.
Automated assignment of projects to evaluators.
Custom interface for classification and internal comments.
Migration of Drupal 9 to Drupal 10.

Goal: Technical and graphic takeover of the E-Nymphea Collexion sites (SaaS solution for online booking for spas and wellness centers), with the unification of the technical base, migration to PHP 7.4, and performance optimization.
Migration of the existing platform to PHP 7.4.
Graphic redesign of several client sites while respecting the visual identity of each institution.
Performance optimization.
Goal: Custom development of a website offering a turnkey solution for health establishments in France to assess and improve their performance in the field of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR).
Development of custom designed themes.
Development of custom plugins, including DocuSign integration with Ultimate Member for user registration.
Automated PDF creation via a custom WordPress plugin.
Goal: Development of an electrical engineering training platform for Formapelec, with a custom theme using TailwindCSS.
Consumption of ERP feeds (training/sessions) with synchronization via CRON.
Development of custom filters for training and sessions.
Creation of training sheets in PDF format.
Creation of custom templates.
Goal: Maintenance of the company's website and 1st level assistance to teachers and administration.
Immediate assistance to users, installation of equipment and 1st level maintenance.
Writing and integration of explanatory content, videos, etc., in SEO format.
